snippet: Two southern New Jersey men are accused of starting large brush fires this week so they could steal copper and tools from a business, the police said.
abstract: Greg Woodman and Michael Sloan Jr are accused of starting brush fires in Pine Hill, NJ, and are charged with arson.
lead_paragraph: Two southern New Jersey men are accused of starting large brush fires this week so they could steal copper and tools from a business, the police said.

headline.main: Two Men Charged in New Jersey Fire
headline.print_headline: Two Men Charged In New Jersey Fire
